<?php

class Solution {
    public function minimumOperations(array $nums, array $target): int {
        $length = count($nums);
        $differences = array();
        
         for ($i = 0; $i < $length; $i++) {
            $differences[$i] = $target[$i] - $nums[$i];
        }
        
        $totalOperations = 0;
        $currentSegmentDiff = 0;
        
        for ($i = 0; $i < $length; $i++) {
            if ($i == 0) {
                 $totalOperations += abs($differences[$i]);
                $currentSegmentDiff = $differences[$i];
            } elseif (($differences[$i - 1] > 0 && $differences[$i] > 0) || ($differences[$i - 1] < 0 && $differences[$i] < 0)) {
                 $additionalOperations = abs($differences[$i]) - abs($currentSegmentDiff);
                if ($additionalOperations > 0) {
                    $totalOperations += $additionalOperations;
                }
                $currentSegmentDiff = $differences[$i];
            } else {
                 $totalOperations += abs($differences[$i]);
                $currentSegmentDiff = $differences[$i];
            }
        }
        
        return $totalOperations;
    }
}


$sol = new Solution();
$nums1 = [3, 5, 1, 2];
$target1 = [4, 6, 2, 4];
echo "Example 1 Output: " . $sol->minimumOperations($nums1, $target1) . "\n"; // Output: 2

$nums2 = [1, 3, 2];
$target2 = [2, 1, 4];
echo "Example 2 Output: " . $sol->minimumOperations($nums2, $target2) . "\n"; // Output: 5

?>
